name: Yokai Assault Public Alpha V1.1
description:
[OBLIGATORY ALPHA RELEASE NOTE]
This game is still VERY unfinished and lacking numerous bug fixes, polishes, and QOL improvements that will be implemented during development. There exists no win/lose condition, but the game is 'playable' up to wave 49 across 13 levels. Please let me know of any bugs you find in the comments, or any notes about your general experience, all feedback is helpful! Thanks for your time =)

Defend the shrines of Ho-oh against Ashura and her minions in this cute-and-casual Tower Defense games. Use ninjas and powerful buildings to slay the little demons across 13 (soon to be 15) levels.

Current Implementations-

  • 8 Towers, including 5 ninjas and 3 buildings
  • 3 types of enemies, with 5 different modifiers
    • Types-
      • Normal - Small demons with low health
      • Flying - Faster demons that ignore the path, sprinting for the goal
      • MiniBoss/Chonkers - Big, slower demons with big health
    • Modifers-
      • Basic - Red demons with no special qualities
      • Fast - Yellow demons who sprint to the goal
      • Armored - Grey demons who lumber to the goal with an extra health bar
      • Invisible - Transparent demons who can only be detected via the right upgrades to your ninjas/buildings
      • Boomer - Brown demons who dash towards the goal (faster than Fast demons) and explode on death, dealing massive damage to your shrine
  • 49 waves across 13 levels
  • 6 different upgrades across 2 trees for all towers

Planned Implementations-
1. Storyline with cutscenes
2. 9th tower, Altar, that provides screenwipe
3. Final 2 levels
4. Unique Boss Enemies on each level
5. 3 new enemy modifiers (Healer, Freezer, Teleporter)
5. Achievement system with permanent upgrades as rewards
6. Better title screen
